comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://m.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.youtube.com%2F) ### Comment > Twice the cookie warning comes out and with the same settings two annoying ads between yesterday and today in the last update of the extension filters for firefox on android‚ as a curiosity the two 30 second ads were activated only when I started listening to music on youtube before with the same settings all ads were blocked correctly‚ help me to fix it ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bc1z4lexzc0g0gcgcsw80gw8gwsw88o7aluhh48xws.jpg?nc=1)
